title: Avenger: Endgame
description: The Avengers unite to reverse the damage caused by Thanos in Infinity War. The epic showdown results in the Avengers going on a journey through time and space.

title: Up
description: A grumpy old man named Carl Fredricksen ties thousands of balloons to his house to fly to the South American wilderness. But he discovers a young stowaway, and the two embark on an adventure.

title: Spider-Man: Across the Verse
description: The film explores the concept of the multiverse and features multiple Spider-Men from different dimensions. They must unite to fight a threat that could potentially destroy all their realities.

title: Interstellar
description: A group of explorers leave Earth to travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival as Earth's resources are nearly exhausted.

title: Cars 3
description: Lightning McQueen sets out to prove to a new generation of racers that he's still the best race car in the world. This journey leads him to discover that winning isn't everything.

title: Joker
description: The film provides a possible origin story for the Joker and presents a character study of a man disregarded by society that is not only a gritty character study, but also a broader cautionary tale.
